Package src.paillier.crypto

Class Summary
PaillierCipher PaillierCipher providing the buffering and block handling in implementation of this class.
PaillierHomomorphicCipher This class supports only decimal numbers and the input length should be strictly smaller than the key size, otherwise exception is thrown.
PaillierKey The Key interface is the top-level interface for all keys.
PaillierKeyPairGenerator The PaillierKeyPairGenerator class is used to generate pairs of public and private keys.
PaillierPrivateKey The PaillierPrivateKey holds lambda and mu.
PaillierProvider In addition to registering implementations of cryptographic services, the Provider class can also be used to register implementations of other security services that might get defined as part of the JDK Security API or one of its extensions JCA ,JCE.
PaillierPublicKey PaillierPublicKey contains n,nsquare,g and r.
